ComicInfo.Series: The Mummy: Valley of the Gods
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Mummy comes to Chaos! and it's time for you to unwrap the suspense! It began thousands of years ago in ancient Egypt, and now a new year begins in 1927, when the inimitable Rick O'Connell returns with his new wife, Evelyn, her brother, Jonathan and the man named Ardeth Bay to face a menace even more deadly than Imhotep, "The Mummy." But can they stop what lurks beneath the "Valley Of The Gods?" An action-packed, all-original comics novel in three thrilling chapters. Also, introducing the menace of "The Scorpion King," played by the WWFs The Rock, a powerful force of nature featured in the upcoming blockbuster movie, The Mummy Returns!
Cover | Creators | Sidebar location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Matt Broome & Digital Broome | 1 | B | Photo | 2 | C | Mike Wieringo, Rich Koslowski, Digital Broome | 3 | Dynamic Force | Photo | 4 |
